entities.name: borgin and burkes
entities.description: Borgin and Burkes is a shop devoted to the Dark Arts, located in Kn ockturn Alley.

entities.name: knockturn alley
entities.description: Kn ockturn Alley is a street filled with shops devoted to the Dark Arts, where Harry finds himself after emerging from Borgin and Burkes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story, who has emerged into Kn ockturn Alley and is trying to find a way out.

entities.name: weasleys' fire
entities.description: Weasleys' fire is where Harry was before he ended up in Kn ockturn Alley, where he had spoken through his mouthful of ashes.

relationships.description: Harry emerged into Borgin and Burkes after speaking through his mouthful of ashes in the Weasleys' fire.
Harry finds himself in Kn ockturn Alley, a street filled with shops devoted to the Dark Arts.
Borgin and Burkes is located in Kn ockturn Alley.
